text: A person becomes a general partner:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 401 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-704.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: As provided in the partnership agreement:
Under § 29-708.01(3)(B) following the dissociation of a limited partnership's last general partner;
As the result of a merger under subchapter X of this chapter or a transaction under Chapter 2 of this title; or
With the consent of all the partners.
